title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Third French Lockdown
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 30 March 2021.
content:
France’s decision to enter a third lockdown makes it even more urgent that the Conservatives introduce stricter border controls.
